title: Question:
author: coinremitter
content: In this poll, we want to hear your thoughts on Litecoin's standout feature. Share with us what you find most appealing about Litecoin and why it resonates with you. Your insights will help shed light on the unique qualities that draw people to this cryptocurrency.

comments.author: Iron Fist
comments.body: I wanted to participate in your poll, but I can only select one answer, which I don't find ideal. Why didn't you enable the option for multiple answers?

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: It's amazing how the transaction privacy isn't even part of the options. Litecoin has deployed MimbleWimble for that particular purpose just so you know but I guess only a few are using it. There are chains that are far more cheaper and faster but are way less decentralized than Litecoin since it's still using POW so that's probably another major feature.
